text: Gyani Zail Singh (; born Jarnail Singh, 5 May 1916 â€“ 25 December 1994Obituary: Zail Singh". The Independent. 1994-12-29. Retrieved 2018-22-06.) was an Indian politician. He was the seventh President of India from 1982 to 1987. He was a politician with the Indian National Congress party. Singh was killed in a car crash in Chandigarh, India on 25 December 1994 at the age of 78. ==References== Category:1916 births Category:1994 deaths Category:Road accident deaths Category:Presidents of India
title: Zail Singh
